DOC.detailed_description: The potential widespread human disease due H3N2v influenza viruses considerable . Infection virus would likely impact young child . This study evaluate safety immunogenicity H3N2v MN 2010/AA ca live attenuated influenza vaccine ( H3N2v LAIV ) healthy child adult , 6 26 year old . The study enroll participant sequentially four group : Group 1 include H3N2v seronegative adult age 18-26 year ; Group 2 include H3N2v seropositive adolescent age 13-17 year ; Group 3 include H3N2v seronegative adolescent age 13-17 year ; Group 4 include child age 6 12 year , screen H3N2v serostatus . At study entry ( Day 0 ) , participant Group 1 receive one dose H3N2v LAIV . Participants Groups 2 , 3 , 4 randomly assign receive two dos either H3N2v LAIV placebo , receive first dose Day 0 second dose Day 28 . On Day 84 , participant receive one dose H3N2v IIV ( inactivated booster vaccine ) . Participants attend several additional study visit Day 180 . These visit may include physical examination ; respiratory examination ; collection blood , urine , nasal fluid .
